issue.title: [CF 152] Spellcast Condition
issue.body:
Hey, I love the new conditions you've added with TMW Beta 10. I just have a small suggestion with the condition Spellcast. Instead of making it a two choice Present-Absent, could you make a 3 choice? Present, Only Interruptable, Absent.

Keep up the good work. ^_^


> Posted by CurseForge user Beruchan | Imported from CurseForge issue #152 | Raw

comments.body:
Oh and this just occurred to me as well. Could be possible when using Buffs and Debuffs as conditions that you could check stack count too?
